sentence.Network_en: The player threw back the ball to the wicket - keeper.
sentence.Network_cn: 运动员将球投回给板球守门员.

sentence.Network_en: Three of the batsmen were caught out by the wicket - keeper.
sentence.Network_cn: 那三柱门守员员接住了球而迫使三个击球员退场.

sentence.Network_en: I drove out of the gates, past the keeper's lodge.
sentence.Network_cn: 我驶出大门，经过守门人的小屋。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 门将;守门员 wicket-keeper 后卫 cover point 野手 fielder 棒球 [Baseball] 一垒 first base 一垒手 first baseman 一垒打 one-base hit; single 一垒审 first.
守门手（wicket-keeper）是一名始终站在击球员三柱门之后的特殊守备员。他的主要任务是接收击球员未能击中的传球和投球，来防止他们.
捕手（wicket-keeper）是一名始终站在击球员三柱门之后的特殊外野手。他的主要任务是接收击球手未能击中的传球和投球，来防止他们.

means.word_mean: 1. stands behind the wicket to catch balls

auth_sentence.content: So, the lighthouse keeper gets a new job.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, the lighthouse keeper gets a new job.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, the lighthouse keeper gets a new job.

auth_sentence.content: Please note - I am NOT my brothers keeper.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please note - I am NOT my brothers keeper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please note - I am NOT my brothers keeper.

auth_sentence.content: Yet she was the keeper of the old songs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet she was the keeper of the old songs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet she was the keeper of the old songs.
